messages.content: माझ्या पिकाला पाणी द्यावे का?
messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikala pani dyave ka?

messages.content:
तुमच्या "Chiku plot" मध्ये पाण्याची गरज आहे. सध्या, मातीतील आर्द्रता 32% आणि 28% आहे, जे की 60% च्या आदर्श पातळीपेक्षा कमी आहे. त्यामुळे पाणी देणे आवश्यक आहे. 

तथापि, यामागील कारणे असू शकतात, जसे की वायरची हानी किंवा उपकरण हवा मध्ये असणे. कृपया याची तपासणी करा, आणि तुम्ही समस्या सोडवण्यासाठी सपोर्ट तिकीट उघडू शकता.
messages.en:
You need water in your "Chiku plot". Currently, soil moisture content is 32% and 28%, which is lower than the ideal level of 60%. Therefore, watering is necessary. 

However, there may be reasons behind this, such as damage to the wire or the appliance being in the air. Please check this, and you can open a support ticket to resolve the issue.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya "Chiku plot" madhye panyachi garaj aahe. sadhya, matitil ardrata 32% ani 28% aahe, j key 60% chya adarsh patalipeksa kami aahe. tyamule pani dene avashyak aahe. 

tathapi, yamagil karane asu shakatat, jase key vayarachi hani kinva upakaran hava madhye asane. kripaya yachi tapasani kara, ani tumhi samasya sodavanyasathi support tikit ughadu shakata.

messages.content: माझ्या पिकाला पाणी द्यावे का?
messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?

messages.content: तुमच्या "वांगे प्लॉट" मध्ये सध्या 33% मातीची आर्द्रता आहे, जी 70% च्या आदर्श आर्द्रतेच्या खाली आहे. त्यामुळे, तुम्ही पाणी देऊ शकता.
messages.en: Your "brinjal plot" currently has 33% soil moisture, which is below the ideal humidity of 70%. Therefore, you can give water.
messages.content_transliterated: tumachya "vange plot" madhye sadhya 33% matichi ardrata aahe, g 70% chya adarsh ardratechya khali aahe. tyamule, tumhi pani deu shakata.

messages.content: माझ्या पिकाला पाणी द्यावे का?
messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikala pani dyave ka?

messages.content: तुमच्या पिकाला पाणी देण्याची स्थिती अशी आहे की "तुमच्या प्लॉटची रिचार्ज माहिती संपली आहे, कृपया डेटा पाहण्यासाठी रिचार्ज करा." त्यामुळे, सध्या पाणी देण्याबाबत योग्य माहिती उपलब्ध नाही.
messages.en: The situation of watering your crop is such that "the recharge information of your plot is exhausted, please recharge to see the data."
messages.content_transliterated: tumachya pikala pani denyachi sthiti ashi aahe key "tumachya plotchy recharge mahiti sampali aahe, kripaya data pahanyasathi recharge kara." tyamule, sadhya pani denyababat yogy mahiti upalabdh nahi.

messages.content: ನಾನು ನನ್ನ ಬೆಳೆಗೆ ನೀರು ಹಾಕಬೇಕೆ?
messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: nanu nanna belege neeru hakabeke?

messages.content:
ನೀವು ನಿಮ್ಮ ಬೆಳೆಗೆ ನೀರು ಹಾಕಬಹುದು. ಆದರೆ, ನಿಮ್ಮ ಮಣ್ಣು moisture reading 0 kPa (ಮಣ್ಣು ತೇವ) ಮತ್ತು 200 kPa (ಮಣ್ಣು ಒಣ) ನಡುವೆ ಇದೆ. ಆದರೆ, ನಿಮ್ಮ soil moisture sensor 2 200 kPa ತಲುಪಿದೆ, ಇದು ಒಣದ ಸ್ಥಿತಿಯಲ್ಲಿದೆ. ಇದು ನಿಮ್ಮ ಬೆಳೆಗೆ ನೀರು ಹಾಕಲು ಸೂಚಿಸುತ್ತದೆ.

ಆದರೆ, ಈ reading ಗಳು ಅಸಾಧಾರಣವಾಗಿರಬಹುದು, ಏಕೆಂದರೆ 200 kPa reading ಸಾಮಾನ್ಯವಾಗಿ ಒಣದ ಸ್ಥಿತಿಯಲ್ಲಿದೆ. ದಯವಿಟ್ಟು ನಿಮ್ಮ ಸಾಧನವನ್ನು ಪರಿಶೀಲಿಸಿ ಅಥವಾ ಬೆಂಬಲ ಟಿಕೆಟ್ ಅನ್ನು ಎತ್ತಿ.
messages.en:
You can water your crop. However, your soil moisture reading is between 0 kPa (soil moist) and 200 kPa (dry soil). But, your soil moisture sensor 2 has reached 200 kPa, which is in a dry state. This suggests watering your crop.

However, these readings can be unusual, as a reading of 200 kPa is usually dry. Please check your device or pick up a support ticket.
messages.content_transliterated:
neevu nimma belege neeru hakabahudu. adare, nimma mannu moisture reading 0 kPa (mannu deva) mattu 200 kPa (mannu on) naduve ide. adare, nimma soil moisture sensor 2 200 kPa talupide, idu onada sthitiallide. idhu nimma belege neeru hakalu suchisuttade.

adare, e reading galu asadharanavagirabahud, ekendare 200 kPa reading samanyavagi onada sthitiallide. dayavittu nimma sadhanavannu parishilisi athava bemble ticket annu ethi.

initial_message: मागील आठवड्यात माझ्या पिकावर कोणते रोग किंवा कीड आली होती?

messages.content: मागील आठवड्यात माझ्या पिकावर कोणते रोग किंवा कीड आली होती?
messages.en: What disease or pest did my crop suffer last week?
messages.standalone_question: What diseases or pests affected my crop last week?
messages.content_transliterated: magil athavadyat mazya pikavar conte rog kinva kid ali hoti?

messages.content: माझ्या तपासणीनुसार, मागील आठवड्यात तुमच्या "Banana plot" पिकावर कोणतेही रोग किंवा कीड संबंधित मेट्रिक्स उपलब्ध नाहीत. त्यामुळे, कोणतीही समस्या दिसत नाही.
messages.en: According to my investigation, there are no disease or pest related metrics available on your "Banana plot" crop last week. So, I don't see any problem.
messages.content_transliterated: majhya tapasaninusar, magil aathvadyat tumachya "Banana plot" pikavar kontehi rog kinva kid sambandhit metrics upalabdh nahit. tyamule, kontihi samasya disat nahi.

initial_message: डाळिंब पिकावर आता सध्या औषध मारायला चालते का

messages.content: डाळिंब पिकावर आता सध्या औषध मारायला चालते का
messages.en: Is the pomegranate crop now being used for medicine?
messages.standalone_question: Is it the right time to apply pesticides on my pomegranate crop?
messages.content_transliterated: dalimb pikavar ata sadhya ausadh marayala chalte ka

messages.content:
डाळिंब पिकावर औषध मारण्यासाठी सध्या चांगली परिस्थिती आहे. आजच्या दिवशी औषध मारण्यासाठी खालील वेळा "IDEAL" स्थितीत आहेत:

- 07:30 AM
- 08:30 AM
- 09:30 AM
- 10:30 AM
- 11:30 AM
- 06:30 PM
- 07:30 PM
- 08:30 PM
- 09:30 PM

तुम्ही या वेळात औषध मारू शकता.
messages.en:
At present, there is a good situation to kill the pomegranate crop. The following times are in the "IDEAL" position to kill the drug today:

- 07:30 AM
- 08:30 AM
- 09:30 AM
- 10:30 AM
- 11:30 AM
- 06:30 PM
- 07:30 PM
- 08:30 PM
- 09:30 PM

You can kill the medicine during this time.
messages.content_transliterated:
dalimb pikavar aushadh maranyasathi sadhya changli paristhiti aahe. ajachya divshi aushadh maranyasathi khalil vela "IDEAL" sthitit aahet:

- 07:30 AM
- 08:30 AM
- 09:30 AM
- 10:30 AM
- 11:30 AM
- 06:30 PM
- 07:30 PM
- 08:30 PM
- 09:30 PM

tumhi ya velat aushadh maru shakta.

initial_message: મારા પાક માટે કયું ખાતર વાપરવું?

messages.content: મારા પાક માટે કયું ખાતર વાપરવું?
messages.en: Which fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mara pak mate kayu khatar vaparvu?

messages.content:
તમારા પાક માટે ખાતર વાપરવાની માહિતી નીચે મુજબ છે:

### 1. **પ્લોટ: 2,4 નમ્બર ખાખડા વાળા**
- **હાલનું તબક્કો:** પાક સ્થાપના (Crop establishment)
- **હાલમાં ખાતર આપવાની જરૂર નથી.**
- **આગામી તબક્કો:** વેજિટેટિવ ગ્રોથ (Vegetative growth)
  - **1મો સપ્તાહ, 1મો દિવસ:** 
    - **હ્યુમિક એસિડ:** 1 લિટર/એકર
  - **1મો સપ્તાહ, 4મો દિવસ:**
    - **12-61-0:** 6 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
    - **યુરિયા:** 2 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

### 2. **પ્લોટ: (6,7,8)ફલજીભાઈ વાડુ**
- **હાલનું તબક્કો:** પાક સ્થાપના (Crop establishment)
- **હાલમાં ખાતર આપવાની જરૂર નથી.**
- **આગામી તબક્કો:** વેજિટેટિવ ગ્રોથ (Vegetative growth)
  - **1મો સપ્તાહ, 1મો દિવસ:** 
    - **હ્યુમિક એસિડ:** 1 લિટર/એકર
  - **1મો સપ્તાહ, 4મો દિવસ:**
    - **12-61-0:** 6 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
    - **યુરિયા:** 2.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

### 3. **પ્લોટ: નાથાભાઈ વાડુ**
- **હાલનું તબક્કો:** પાક સ્થાપના (Crop establishment)
- **હાલમાં ખાતર આપવાની જરૂર નથી.**
- **આગામી તબક્કો:** વેજિટેટિવ ગ્રોથ (Vegetative growth)
  - **1મો સપ્તાહ, 1મો દિવસ:** 
    - **હ્યુમિક એસિડ:** 1 લિટર/એકર
  - **1મો સપ્તાહ, 4મો દિવસ:**
    - **12-61-0:** 6 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
    - **યુરિયા:** 2.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

### 4. **પ્લોટ: ભાભા વાડુ**
- **હાલનું તબક્કો:** પાક સ્થાપના (Crop establishment)
- **હાલમાં ખાતર આપવાની જરૂર નથી.**
- **આગામી તબક્કો:** વેજિટેટિવ ગ્રોથ (Vegetative growth)
  - **1મો સપ્તાહ, 1મો દિવસ:** 
    - **હ્યુમિક એસિડ:** 1 લિટર/એકર
  - **1મો સપ્તાહ, 4મો દિવસ:**
    - **12-61-0:** 6 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
    - **યુરિયા:** 2.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

### 5. **પ્લોટ: 3,5 નિલગિરી વાડુ**
- **હાલનું તબક્કો:** પાક સ્થાપના (Crop establishment)
- **હાલમાં ખાતર આપવાની જરૂર નથી.**
- **આગામી તબક્કો:** વેજિટેટિવ ગ્રોથ (Vegetative growth)
  - **1મો સપ્તાહ, 1મો દિવસ:** 
    - **હ્યુમિક એસિડ:** 1 લિટર/એકર
  - **1મો સપ્તાહ, 4મો દિવસ:**
    - **12-61-0:** 6 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
    - **યુરિયા:** 2 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

જો તમને વધુ માહિતી જોઈએ તો જણાવશો!
messages.en:
The information to use fertilizer for your crop is as follows:

### 1. **Plot: No. 2,4 with Khakhada**
- **Current Stage:** Crop Establishment
- **No need to fertilize at present.**
- **Next Stage:** Vegetative Growth
  - **1st week, 1st day:** 
    - **Humic acid:** 1 liter/acre
  - **1st week, 4th day:**
    - **12-61-0:** 6 kg/acre
    - **Urea:** 2 kg/acre

### 2. **Plot: (6,7,8)Faljibhai Vadu**

    - **Urea:** 2.5 kg/acre

### 4. **Plot: Bhabha Wadu**
- **Current Stage:** Crop Establishment
- **No need to fertilize at present.**
- **Next Stage:** Vegetative Growth
  - **1st week, 1st day:** 
    - **Humic acid:** 1 liter/acre
  - **1st week, 4th day:**
    - **12-61-0:** 6 kg/acre
    - **Urea:** 2.5 kg/acre

### 5. **Plot: 3,5 Nilgiri Wadu**
- **Current Stage:** Crop Establishment

- **Next Stage:** Vegetative Growth
  - **1st week, 1st day:** 
    - **Humic acid:** 1 liter/acre
  - **1st week, 4th day:**

Let me know if you need more information!

initial_message: ಕಳೆದ ವಾರ ನನ್ನ ಬೆಳೆ ಮೇಲೆ ಯಾವ ಹುಳುಗಳು ಅಥವಾ ರೋಗಗಳು தாக்கಮಾಡಿವೆ?

messages.content: ಕಳೆದ ವಾರ ನನ್ನ ಬೆಳೆ ಮೇಲೆ ಯಾವ ಹುಳುಗಳು ಅಥವಾ ರೋಗಗಳು தாக்கಮಾಡಿವೆ?
messages.en: What pests or diseases have affected my crop in the last week?
messages.standalone_question: What pests or diseases affected my crop last week?
messages.content_transliterated: kaleda vara nanna bele mele yava hulugalu athava rogas tanakamadive?

messages.content: ಕಳೆದ ವಾರ ನಿಮ್ಮ "ಅನುಷ್ಕಾ ಪ್ಲಾಟ್" ಬೆಳೆ ಮೇಲೆ ಯಾವುದೇ ಹುಳುಗಳು ಅಥವಾ ರೋಗಗಳ ಮೇಲೆ ಮಾಹಿತಿ ಲಭ್ಯವಿಲ್ಲ. ದಯವಿಟ್ಟು ಇನ್ನಷ್ಟು ಮಾಹಿತಿಗಾಗಿ ಸಂಪರ್ಕಿಸಿ.
messages.en: Last week there was no information available on any pests or diseases on your "Anushka Plot" crop. Please contact for more information.
messages.content_transliterated: kaleda vara nimma "anushka plot" bele mele yavude hulugalu athava rogas mele mahiti labhyavilla. dayavittu innashtu mahitigagi samparkisi.

messages.content: Hi
messages.en: Hi
messages.standalone_question: What information do you have about pests or diseases affecting my crop last week?

messages.content: ನಮಸ್ಕಾರ! ನಿಮಗೆ ಹೇಗೆ ಸಹಾಯ ಮಾಡಬಹುದು?
messages.en: Salutation! How can I help you?

messages.content: Ga

messages.content: ನೀವು ಏನಾದರೂ ಕೇಳಲು ಬಯಸುತ್ತೀರಾ? ನಾನು ನಿಮ್ಮ ಬೆಳೆಗಳಿಗೆ ಸಂಬಂಧಿಸಿದ ಯಾವುದೇ ಪ್ರಶ್ನೆಗಳಿಗೆ ಸಹಾಯ ಮಾಡಲು ಇಲ್ಲಿದ್ದೇನೆ.
messages.en: Is there anything you want to ask? I am here to help you with any questions related to your crops.

messages.content: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikasathi conte khat vaparave?

messages.content:
आपल्या पिकासाठी (द्राक्षे) खालील खतांचा वापर करावा:

### Plot No 1 Mama Jumbo
- **सध्याचा टप्पा:** फळ सेट (Fruit Set)
- **फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल:**
  - **फोलिअर पद्धतीने:**
    - **फेरस सल्फेट:** 800 ग्रॅम/एकर
    - **मॅंगनीज सल्फेट:** 800 ग्रॅम/एकर
  - **फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने:**
    - **11-44-11:** 5.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
    - **साल्फेट ऑफ पोटाश:** 3.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
    - **मॅग्नेशियम सल्फेट:** 1.5 किलोग्राम/एकर

### Plot No 2 Mama Jambo
- **सध्याचा टप्पा:** शूट विकास (Shoot Development)
- **फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल:**
  - **फोलिअर पद्धतीने:**
    - **सोल्यूबोर:** 300 ग्रॅम/एकर
    - **गिब्बेरलिक ऍसिड (GA3):** 15 पीपीएम/प्लांट

### Plot No 3 Mama Jambo
- **सध्याचा टप्पा:** शूट विकास (Shoot Development)
- **फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल:**
  - **फोलिअर पद्धतीने:**
    - **सोल्यूबोर:** 300 ग्रॅम/एकर
    - **गिब्बेरलिक ऍसिड (GA3):** 15 पीपीएम/प्लांट

### Plot No 4 Manik Chaman
- **सध्याचा टप्पा:** शूट विकास (Shoot Development)
- **फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल:**
  - **फोलिअर पद्धतीने:**
    - **सोल्यूबोर:** 300 ग्रॅम/एकर
    - **गिब्बेरलिक ऍसिड (GA3):** 15 पीपीएम/प्लांट

### पुढील शेड्यूल:
- **सर्व प्लॉटसाठी:** फुलांचा प्रारंभ (Beginning of Bloom) 29 नोव्हेंबर 2025 पासून.

कृपया या शेड्यूलनुसार खतांचा वापर करा.
messages.en:
The following fertilizers should be used for your crop (grapes):

### Plot No 1 Mama Jumbo
- **Current Phase:** Fruit Set
- **Fertigation Schedule:**
  - **Foliar Method:**
    - **Ferrous sulfate:** 800 g/acre
    - **Manganese sulfate:** 800 g/acre
  - **Fertigation Method:**
    - **11-44-11:** 5.5 kg/acre
    - **Sulfate of Potash:** 3.5 kg/acre
    - **Magnesium Sulfate:** 1.5 kg/acre

### Plot No 2 Mama Jambo
- **Current Phase:** Shoot Development
- **Fertigation Schedule:**
  - **Foliar Method:**
    - **Solubor:** 300 g/acre
    - **Gibberellic Acid (GA3):** 15 ppm/plant

### Plot No 3 Mama Jambo
- **Current Phase:** Shoot Development
- **Fertigation Schedule:**
  - **Foliar Method:**
    - **Solubor:** 300 g/acre
    - **Gibberellic Acid (GA3):** 15 ppm/plant

### Plot No 4 Manik Chaman
- **Current Phase:** Shoot Development
- **Fertigation Schedule:**
  - **Foliar Method:**
    - **Solubor:** 300 g/acre
    - **Gibberellic Acid (GA3):** 15 ppm/plant

### Next Schedule:
- **For all plots:** Beginning of Bloom from November 29, 2025.

Please use fertilizers according to this schedule.

initial_message: Plot no 2 var network problem ahe

messages.content: Plot no 2 var network problem ahe
messages.en: Plot no 2 var network problem ahe
messages.standalone_question: Is there a network problem on Plot No. 2?

messages.content:
Plot No.2 वर नेटवर्क समस्या आहे. सध्या तुमच्या डिव्हाइसने 26.64 तासांपूर्वी डेटा पाठवला आहे, त्यामुळे डेटा अद्ययावत नाही. 

कृपया खालील गोष्टी तपासा:
- तुमच्या डिव्हाइसचे कनेक्शन योग्य आहे का?
- नेटवर्क कनेक्टिव्हिटी तपासा.
- बॅटरीची स्थिती तपासा, ती 77% आहे.
- जर समस्या कायम राहिली, तर तुम्ही Fyllo ग्राहक समर्थनाशी संपर्क साधू शकता किंवा मी तुमच्यासाठी सपोर्ट तिकीट उघडू शकतो. 

तुम्हाला सपोर्ट तिकीट उघडायचे आहे का?
messages.en:
There is a network problem on Plot No.2. Currently, your device has sent data 26.64 hours ago, so the data is not up to date. 

Please check the following:
- Is your device connected properly?
- Check network connectivity.
- Check the condition of the battery, it is 77%.
- If the problem persists, you can contact Fyllo customer support or I can open a support ticket for you. 

Do you want to open a support ticket?
messages.content_transliterated:
Plot No.2 var network samasya aahe. sadhya tumachya divhaisane 26.64 tasampurvi data pathavala aahe, tyamule data adyayavat nahi. 

kripaya khalil gosti tapasa:
- tumachya device connection yogy aahe ka?
- network connectivity tapasa.
- batterichi sthiti tapasa, ti 77% aahe.
- jar samasya kayam rahili, tar tumhi Fyllo grahak samarthanashi sampark sadhu shakata kinva me tumachyaasaathhi support tikit ughadu shakato. 

tumhala support tikit ughadayache aahe ka?

messages.content: Saport
messages.en: Saport
messages.standalone_question: Is there support available for my network issue?

तुमच्या डिव्हाइससाठी सपोर्ट तिकीट यशस्वीरित्या उघडले आहे. तिकीट क्रमांक: 687531. 

कृपया तुमच्या समस्येवर लवकरच लक्ष दिले जाईल. तुम्हाला आणखी काही मदतीची आवश्यकता आहे का?

The support ticket for your device has been successfully opened. Ticket No.: 687531. 

Please your problem will be addressed soon. Do you need any more help?

tumachya divaisasathi support tikit yashasviritya ughadale aahe. ticket kramank: 687531.

initial_message: મારા પાક માટે કયું ખાતર વાપરવું?

messages.content: મારા પાક માટે કયું ખાતર વાપરવું?
messages.en: Which fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mara pak mate kayu khatar vaparvu?

messages.content:
તમારા પાક માટે, હાલ કોઈ ખાતર આપવાની જરૂર નથી. પરંતુ આગામી સપ્તાહમાં, જ્યારે પાક "વૃદ્ધિ" તબક્કામાં જશે, ત્યારે નીચે મુજબ ખાતર આપવાની સૂચના છે:

1. **પ્રથમ સપ્તાહ (1 દિવસ)**:
   - **ખાતર**: હ્યુમિક એસિડ (Humic Acid)
   - **માત્રા**: 1 લિટર/એકર
   - **નોંધ**: ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડને અન્ય ખાતરોની અરજી કરતા 15-20 મિનિટ પહેલા અલગથી લાગુ કરવું જોઈએ.

2. **પ્રથમ સપ્તાહ (4 દિવસ)**:
   - **ખાતરો**:
     - 12-61-0: 6 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
     - યુરિયા: 6 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - અથવા
     - 24-24-0: 16 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - અથવા
     - યુરિયા: 7.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
     - ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ 80%: 5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **નોંધ**: ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડને અન્ય ખાતરોની અરજી કરતા 15-20 મિનિટ પહેલા અલગથી લાગુ કરવું જોઈએ.

આ માહિતી મુજબ, ખાતર આપવાની પ્રક્રિયા 2025-11-29 થી શરૂ થશે.
messages.en:
For your crop, there is no need to apply any fertilizer at the moment. But in the next week, when the crop will go into the "growth" stage, the following is the instruction to fertilize the following:

1. **First week (1 day)**:
   - **Fertilizer**: Humic Acid
   - **Quantity**: 1 liter/acre
   **Note**: Phosphoric acid should be applied separately 15-20 minutes before applying other fertilizers.

2. **First Week (4 days)**:
   - **Assurances**:
     - 12-61-0: 6 kg/acre
     - Urea: 6 kg/acre
   -or
     - 24-24-0: 16 kg/acre
   -or
     - Urea: 7.5 kg/acre
     - Phosphoric Acid 80%: 5 kg/acre
   **Note**: Phosphoric acid should be applied separately 15-20 minutes before applying other fertilizers.

As per this information, the fertilizer administration will start from 2025-11-29.
messages.content_transliterated:
tamara pak mate, hal koi khatar apavani jarur nathi. parantu agami saptahaman, jyaare pak "vriddhi" tabakkaman jashe, tyare nice mujab khatar apavani sucana che:

1. **pratham saptah (1 divas)**:
   - **khatar**: humic acid (Humic Acid)
   - **matra**: 1 litre/acre
   - **nondh**: phosphoric esidane any khataroni arji karta 15-20 minute pela alagathi lagu karvu joie.

2. **pratham saptah (4 divas)**:
   - **khataro**:
     - 12-61-0: 6 kilogram/acre
     - yuriya: 6 kilogram/acre
   - athava
     - 24-24-0: 16 kilogram/acre
   - athava
     - yuriya: 7.5 kilogram/acre
     - phosphoric acid 80%: 5 kilogram/acre
   - **nondh**: phosphoric esidane any khataroni arji karta 15-20 minute pela alagathi lagu karvu joie.

a mahiti mujab, khatar apavani prakriya 2025-11-29 thi sharu thase.

messages.content: શું મને મારી પાકને પાણી આપવું જોઈએ?
messages.en: Should I water my crops?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: shu mane mari pakane pani apvu joie?

messages.content:
હા, તમને તમારા પાક "નેરો પ્લોટ 3" ને પાણી આપવું જોઈએ. 

- **હાલની જમીનની ભેજ**: 40% (ઓપ્ટિમલ ભેજ 70%)
- **સૂચના**: પાણી આપવું શક્ય છે, કારણ કે જમીનની ભેજ ઓપ્ટિમલ મર્યાદા કરતા નીચે છે. 

તેથી, irrigation કરવાની પ્રક્રિયા શરૂ કરો.
messages.en:
Yes, you should water your crop "Narrow Plot 3". 

- **Current soil moisture**: 40% (optimal humidity 70%)
**Instructions**: It is possible to water, as the soil moisture is below the optimal limit. 

So, start the process of irrigation.
messages.content_transliterated:
ha, tamne tamara pak "narrow plot 3" ne pani apvu joie. 

- **halani jaminani bhej**: 40% (optimal bhej 70%)
- **sucana**: pani apvu shaky che, karan ke jaminani bhej optimal maryada karta nice che. 

tethi, irrigation karvani prakriya sharu karo.

messages.content: તમારા પાક "samorplot" માટે પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી, કારણ કે હાલની જમીનની ભેજ 89% છે, જે 70% ના આદર્શ ભેજથી વધુ છે.

messages.content: माझ्या पिकाला पाणी द्यावे का?
messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikala pani dyave ka?

messages.content:
तुमच्या "ssn plot" च्या पिकाला सध्या पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही. 

- **मातीतील आर्द्रता**: 71% आणि 87%
- **आवश्यक आर्द्रता**: 60%

सध्या मातीतील आर्द्रता आवश्यकतेपेक्षा जास्त आहे, त्यामुळे पाणी देणे आवश्यक नाही.
messages.en:
The crop of your "SSN plot" does not need to be watered at this time. 

- **Soil Humidity**: 71% and 87%
- **Required humidity**: 60%

At present, soil moisture is more than required, so watering is not necessary.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya "ssn plot" chya pikala sadhya pani denyachi avashyakata nahi. 

- **matitil ardrata**: 71% ani 87%
- **avashyak ardrata**: 60%

sadhya matitil ardrata avashyakatepeksa jast aahe, tyamule pani dene avashyak nahi.

messages.content: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikasathi conte khat vaparave?

messages.content:
तुमच्या "बनाना प्लॉट" साठी, सध्या तुम्ही "प्रारंभिक वनस्पती वाढ" (Early Vegetative Growth) च्या 6 व्या आठवड्यात आहात. यामध्ये तुम्हाला खालील खतांचा वापर करावा लागेल:

### फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने:
1. **पोटॅशियम नाइट्रेट** - 32 किग्रॅ/प्लांट
2. **युरिया** - 12.5 किग्रॅ/प्लांट
3. **मॅग्नेशियम सल्फेट** - 15 किग्रॅ/प्लांट

या पद्धतीने तुम्ही खतांचा वापर करू शकता. 

### फोलिअर पद्धतीने:
1. **जिंक सल्फेट** - 3.4 किग्रॅ/प्लांट
2. **फेरस सल्फेट** - 2.6 किग्रॅ/प्लांट
3. **मॅंगनीज सल्फेट** - 2.6 किग्रॅ/प्लांट

तुमच्या पुढील आठवड्यात (7 व्या आठवड्यात) तुम्हाला खालील खतांचा वापर करावा लागेल:
- **12-61-0** - 12 किग्रॅ/प्लांट
- **युरिया** - 18 किग्रॅ/प्लांट

कृपया लक्षात ठेवा की फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल (Phosphoric acid) इतर खतांच्या अनुप्रयोगापूर्वी 15-20 मिनिटे स्वतंत्रपणे लागू करावे.

तुमच्या पिकाच्या वाढीसाठी हे खत वापरणे महत्त्वाचे आहे.
messages.en:
For your "Banana Plot", you are currently in the 6th week of "Early Vegetative Growth". In this, you will have to use the following fertilizers:

### Fertigation Method:
1. **Potassium Nitrate** - 32 kg/plant
2. **Urea** - 12.5kg/plant
3. **Magnesium Sulphate** - 15 kg/plant

You can use fertilizers in this way. 

### Foliar Method:
1. **Zinc Sulfate** - 3.4kg/plant
2. **Ferrous Sulphate** - 2.6 kg/plant
3. **Manganese Sulphate** - 2.6 kg/plant

You will need to use the following fertilizers in your next week (7th week):
- **12-61-0** - 12 kg/plant
- **Urea** - 18 kg/plant

Please note that Phosphoric acid should be applied separately for 15-20 minutes before application of other fertilizers.

It is important to use this fertilizer for the growth of your crop.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya "banana plot" sathi, sadhya tumhi "prarambhik vanaspati vadh" (Early Vegetative Growth) chya 6 vya athavadyat ahat. yamadhye tumhala khalil khatancha vapar karava lagel:

### fertigation paddhatine:
1. **potassium nitrate** - 32 kigra/plant
2. **urea** - 12.5 kigra/plant
3. **magnesium sulphate** - 15 kigra/plant

ya paddhatine tumhi khatancha vapar karu shakata. 

### foliar paddhatine:
1. **jink sulphate** - 3.4 kigra/plant
2. **ferrous sulphate** - 2.6 kigra/plant
3. **manganese sulphate** - 2.6 kigra/plant

tumachya pudhil athavadyat (7 vya athavadyat) tumhala khalil khatancha vapar karava lagel:
- **12-61-0** - 12 kigra/plant
- **urea** - 18 kigra/plant

kripaya laksat theva key phosphoric aml (Phosphoric acid) itar khatanchya anuprayogapurvi 15-20 minute svatantrapane lagu karave.

tumachya pikachya vadhisathi he khat vaparane mahattvache aahe.

messages.content: माझ्या पिकाला पाणी द्यावे का?
messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikala pani dyave ka?

messages.content:
तुमच्या पिकांना पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही. येथे प्रत्येक प्लॉटसाठी सध्याची स्थिती आहे:

1. **Plot no 1 Sudhakar**: 
   - मातीची आर्द्रता: 94% (आवश्यकतेपेक्षा जास्त)

messages.content: माझ्या पिकाला पाणी द्यावे का?
messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikala pani dyave ka?

messages.content:
तुमच्या पिकांना पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही. 

### SSN प्लॉट:
- **सध्याचे मातीचे आर्द्रता**: 13 kPa (आर्द्र), 11 kPa (आर्द्र)
- **आवश्यक आर्द्रता**: 25 kPa
- **पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता**: सध्या पाणी देणे आवश्यक नाही, कारण मातीची आर्द्रता कमी आहे.

### Sudhakar Seedless प्लॉट:
- **सध्याचे मातीचे आर्द्रता**: 2 kPa (आर्द्र), 3 kPa (आर्द्र)
- **आवश्यक आर्द्रता**: 30 kPa
- **पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता**: सध्या पाणी देणे आवश्यक नाही, कारण मातीची आर्द्रता कमी आहे.

### फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल:
#### SSN प्लॉट:
- **सध्याचा पिकाचा टप्पा**: शूट विकास (Shoot Development)
- **सध्याचा आठवडा**: 3
- **फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल**: 
  - **फोलिअर पद्धतीने**: 
    - **Solubor**: 300 gm/acre
    - **Gibberallic acid (GA3)**: 15 ppm/plant
- **उपयुक्तता**: 2025-12-01 पासून "Beginning of Bloom" टप्पा सुरू होईल.

#### Sudhakar Seedless प्लॉट:
- **सध्याचा पिकाचा टप्पा**: Topping
- **सध्याचा आठवडा**: 24
- **फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल**: 
  - **फर्टिगेशन आवश्यक नाही.**
- **उपयुक्तता**: "Fruit Pruning" टप्पा 2025-09-03 पासून सुरू होईल.

### कीटकनाशकांची स्थिती:
- **SSN प्लॉट**: कीटकनाशकांची स्थिती तपासता येत नाही.
- **Sudhakar Seedless प्लॉट**: कीटकनाशकांची स्थिती तपासता येत नाही.

तुम्हाला आणखी काही विचारायचे असल्यास, कृपया सांगा!

initial_message: મારા પાક માટે કયું ખાતર વાપરવું?

messages.content: મારા પાક માટે કયું ખાતર વાપરવું?
messages.en: Which fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mara pak mate kayu khatar vaparvu?

messages.content:
તમારા પાક માટે ખાતરનો યોગ્ય ઉપયોગ કરવા માટે, હું તમારા પ્લોટના ખાતરનો શેડ્યૂલ તપાસીશ. કૃપા કરીને થોડીવાર રાહ જુઓ.:

તમારા તમામ પ્લોટ માટે ખાતરનો શેડ્યૂલ ઉપલબ્ધ નથી, કારણ કે તમારા પ્લોટનું રિચાર્જ સમાપ્ત થઈ ગયું છે. કૃપા કરીને તમારા પ્લોટને ફરીથી રિચાર્જ કરો જેથી તમે ખાતરનો શેડ્યૂલ જોઈ શકો.
messages.en:
In order to make proper use of manure for your crops, I will check the fertilizer schedule of your plot. Please wait a few moments:

The fertilizer schedule is not available for all your plots, as your plot has run out of recharge. Please recharge your plot so that you can see the fertilizer schedule.

tamara tamam plot mate khatarano schedule upalabdh nathi, karan ke tamara plotanun recharge samapt thai gayu che. krupa karine tamara plotane farithi recharge karo jethi tame khatarano schedule joi shako.

initial_message: What fertiliser should I use for my crop?

messages.content: What fertiliser should I use for my crop?
messages.en: What fertiliser should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?

messages.content:
For your sugarcane crop in the Grand Growth stage (currently in week 2), you should apply the following fertilizers:

### Current Fertigation Schedule (Week 2):
- **Ammonium Sulphate**: 111.5 kg/acre
- **Muriate of Potash**: 52.5 kg/acre

### Next Fertigation Schedule (Week 3):
Starting from **May 1, 2026**, you can apply:
- **Potassium Nitrate**: 2 kg/acre
- **Urea**: 4 kg/acre
- **Sulfate of Potash**: 1 kg/acre
- **Calcium Nitrate**: 1.5 kg/acre (apply separately, 15-20 minutes after the other fertilizers)

Make sure to follow these recommendations for optimal growth!

messages.content: सध्या डावणी दिसत आहे पानावरती काय करावे
messages.en: What to do on the page right now?
messages.standalone_question: What should I do if I see downy mildew on the leaves?

messages.content:
आपल्या पिकावर सध्या डावणी दिसत असल्यास, खालील गोष्टी करा:

1. **पाण्याची स्थिती तपासा**: आपल्या पिकाला 20 नोव्हेंबर 2025 रोजी 270 मिनिटे पाणी दिले आहे. त्यामुळे, मातीतील आर्द्रता चांगली असावी. तरीही, मातीच्या आर्द्रतेची स्थिती तपासा.

2. **पोषणाची अंमलबजावणी**: आपण नुकतेच विविध पोषणांचे फर्टिगेशन केले आहे, जसे की:
   - 13-40-13 (3 किग्रॅ/एकर)
   - Zinc Oxide (200 ग्रॅम/एकर)
   - सोळूबोर (300 ग्रॅम/एकर)
   - इतर पोषण घटक.

3. **कीड आणि रोगांची तपासणी**: मागील आठवड्यात कोणतेही रोग किंवा कीड आढळले नाहीत. तरीही, पानांवर डावणी दिसत असल्यास, कीड किंवा रोगांचा धोका असू शकतो.

4. **स्प्रे करण्याची स्थिती**: सध्या स्प्रे करण्याच्या स्थितीची तपासणी करता येत नाही. त्यामुळे, योग्य स्थिती असली तरी, स्प्रे करण्यापूर्वी स्थानिक हवामानाची स्थिती तपासा.

जर समस्या कायम राहिली, तर स्थानिक कृषी तज्ञांशी संपर्क साधा.
messages.en:
If your crop is currently seeing downseed, do the following:

1. **Check Water Condition**: Your crop has been watered for 270 minutes on November 20, 2025. Therefore, the moisture content of the soil should be good. Still, check the moisture condition of the soil.

2. **Nutrition Implementation**: You've recently fertilized various nutrients, such as:
   - 13-40-13 (3 kg/acre)
   - Zinc Oxide (200 g/acre)
   - Solubor (300 g/acre)
   Other nutritional factors.

3. **Examination of Pests and Diseases**: No diseases or pests were detected in the last week. Still, if the leaves appear on the leaves, there may be a risk of pests or diseases.

4. **Spraying Condition**: The condition of spraying cannot be checked at present. So, even if it's in the right conditions, check the local weather conditions before spraying.

If the problem persists, contact a local agricultural expert.
messages.content_transliterated:
apalya pikavar sadhya davani disat asalyas, khalil gosti kara:

1. **panyachi sthiti tapasa**: apalya pikala 20 november 2025 roji 270 minite pani dile aahe. tyamule, matitil ardrata changali asavi. tarihi, matichya ardratechi sthiti tapasa.

2. **posanachi ammalabajavani**: apan nukatech vividh posananche fertigation kele aahe, jase key:
   - 13-40-13 (3 kigra/acre)
   - Zinc Oxide (200 gram/acre)
   - solubor (300 gram/acre)
   - itar posan ghatak.

3. **kid ani roganchi tapasani**: magil athavadyat konatehi rog kinva kid adhalale nahit. tarihi, pananvar davani disat asalyas, kid kinva rogancha dhoka asu shakato.

4. **spray karanyachi sthiti**: sadhya spray karanyachya sthitichi tapasani karata yet nahi. tyamule, yogy sthiti asli tari, spray karanyapurvi sthanik havamanachi sthiti tapasa.

jar samasya kayam rahili, tar sthanik krishi tajnanshi sampark sadha.

messages.content: पानावरील डावणी वरती कोणता स्प्रे करावा
messages.en: Which to spray on the bottom of the leaf?
messages.standalone_question: What spray should be applied for the downy mildew on the leaves?
messages.content_transliterated: panavaril davani varati konta spray karava

messages.content:
आपल्या पिकावर पानावरील डावणीवर स्प्रे करण्यासाठी खालील गोष्टी करा:

1. **फंगिसाइड वापरा**: डावणीवर नियंत्रण ठेवण्यासाठी, आपण **कॅप्टन** किंवा **मेटालॅक्सिल** सारख्या फंगिसाइडचा वापर करू शकता. 

2. **स्प्रे करण्याची स्थिती**: सध्या स्प्रे करण्याच्या स्थितीची तपासणी करता येत नाही. तरीही, हवामानाची स्थिती चांगली असल्यास, योग्य वेळेत स्प्रे करणे फायदेशीर ठरू शकते.

3. **कृषी क्रियाकलाप**: आपल्या पिकावर 20 नोव्हेंबर 2025 रोजी विविध पोषणांचे फर्टिगेशन केले आहे, ज्यामध्ये सोळूबोर, जिबरेलिक अॅसिड, आणि इतर पोषण घटकांचा समावेश आहे.

जर समस्या कायम राहिली, तर स्थानिक कृषी तज्ञांशी संपर्क साधा.
messages.en:
To spray your crop with leaf droppings, do the following:

1. **Use a Fungicide**: To control the downside, you can use a fungicide such as **Captain** or **Metalaxyl**. 

2. **Spraying Condition**: The condition of spraying cannot be checked at present. Still, if the weather conditions are good, spraying at the right time can be beneficial.

3. **Agricultural Activities**: Fertilized various nutrients on your crop on November 20, 2025, including Solubor, Gibberellic Acid, and other nutrients.

If the problem persists, contact a local agricultural expert.
messages.content_transliterated:
apalya pikavar panavaril davanivar spray karanyasathi khalil gosti kara:

1. **fungiside vapara**: davanivar niyantran thevanyasathi, apan **captain** kinva **metalaxil** sarakhya phangisaidacha vapar karu shakata. 

2. **spray karanyachi sthiti**: sadhya spray karanyachya sthitichi tapasani karata yet nahi. tarihi, havamanachi sthiti changali asalyas, yogy velet spray karane phayadeshir tharu shakate.

3. **krishi kriyakalap**: apalya pikavar 20 november 2025 roji vividh posananche fertigation kele aahe, jyamadhye solubor, jibrelik acid, ani itar posan ghatakancha samavesh aahe.

jar samasya kayam rahili, tar sthanik krishi tajnanshi sampark sadha.

messages.content:
आपल्या पानांवर लाल किडे (Red Spider Mites) आढळले आहेत. यावर नियंत्रण ठेवण्यासाठी खालील स्प्रे वापरा:

1. **Cyenopyrafen 30% SC** - 0.6 मि.ली.
2. **Spiromesifen 240 SC (22.9% w/w)** - 1 मि.ली.
3. **Fenazaquin 10% EC** - 1.5 मि.ली.

या स्प्रेयांचा वापर करून किडींचा प्रभावीपणे सामना करा. सर्वोत्तम परिणामांसाठी अॅप्लिकेशन मार्गदर्शकांचे पालन करणे सुनिश्चित करा. समस्या कायम राहिल्यास, स्थानिक कृषी तज्ञांशी संपर्क साधा.
messages.en:
Red Spider Mites have been found on your leaves. Use the following sprays to control it:

1. **Cyenopyrafen 30% SC** - 0.6ml
2. **Spiromesifen 240 SC (22.9% w/w)** - 1 ml.
3. **Fenazaquin 10% EC** - 1.5ml

Effectively combat pests by using these sprays. Make sure to follow the application guidelines for best results. If the problem persists, contact a local agricultural expert.

messages.content:
आपल्या पिकावर पानावरील डावणीची सुरुवात झाली आहे. यावर नियंत्रण ठेवण्यासाठी खालील स्प्रे वापरा:

1. **फंगिसाइड**: **कॅप्टन** किंवा **मेटालॅक्सिल** वापरा.
2. **कीटकनाशक**: **Cyenopyrafen** किंवा **Spiromesifen** वापरा.

सध्या स्प्रे करण्याच्या स्थितीची तपासणी करता येत नाही. तरीही, हवामान चांगले असल्यास, योग्य वेळेत स्प्रे करणे फायदेशीर ठरू शकते.

आपण 20 नोव्हेंबर 2025 रोजी विविध पोषणांचे फर्टिगेशन केले आहे, ज्यामध्ये सोळूबोर, जिबरेलिक अॅसिड, आणि इतर पोषण घटकांचा समावेश आहे. 

जर समस्या कायम राहिली, तर स्थानिक कृषी तज्ञांशी संपर्क साधा.
messages.en:
The leaf harvest has begun on your crop. Use the following sprays to control it:

1. **Fungicide**: Use **Captain** or **Metalaxyl**.
2. **Pesticide**: Use **Cyenopyrafen** or **Spiromesifen**.

Currently, the condition of the spray cannot be checked. Still, if the weather is good, spraying at the right time can be beneficial.

We have done various nutrition fortifications on 20th November 2025, which includes Solubore, Gibberellic Acid, and other nutritional components. 

If the problem persists, contact a local agricultural expert.

2. **kitakanashak**: **Cyenopyrafen** kinva **Spiromesifen** vapara.

messages.content:
तुमच्या पिकासाठी (द्राक्षे) खालील खतांचा वापर करावा:

### सध्याची अवस्था: **Beginning Veraison** (सुरुवात वेरायझन)
- **सध्याचा आठवडा:** 1

#### फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने:
- **मैग्नेशियम सल्फेट:** 1.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
- **सल्फेट ऑफ पोटाश:** 5 किलोग्राम/एकर

#### फोलिअर पद्धतीने:
- **सोल्यूबोर:** 300 ग्रॅम/एकर (फोलिअर स्प्रे साठी, पाण्यात 5 किलोग्राम 500 लिटर पाण्यात मिसळा)

### पुढील वेळापत्रक:
- **आगामी अवस्था:** **Harvest** (कापणी)
- **आगामी आठवडा:** 2 (सुरुवात तारीख: 2025-12-28)

तुम्ही या खतांचा वापर करून तुमच्या द्राक्षांच्या पिकाची योग्य वाढ सुनिश्चित करू शकता.
messages.en:
The following fertilizers should be used for your crop (grapes):

### Current State: **Beginning Veraison**
- **Current Week:** 1

#### Fertigation:
- **Magnesium Sulfate:** 1.5 kg/acre
- **Sulphate of Potash:** 5 kg/acre

#### Foliar Method:
- **Solubor:** 300 g/acre (for foliar spray, mix 5 kg of water with 500 liters of water)

### Next Schedule:
- **Upcoming Stage:** **Harvest** (Harvest)
- **Next week:** 2 (start date: 2025-12-28)

You can ensure proper growth of your grape crop by using these fertilizers.

- **sadhyacha athavada:** 1

#### fertigation paddhatine:
- **magnesium sulphate:** 1.5 kilograms/acre
- **sulphate of potash:** 5 kilogram/acre

#### foliar paddhatine:
- **solubor:** 300 gram/acre (foliar spray sathi, panyat 5 kilogram 500 litre panyat misala)

### pudhil velapatrak:
- **agami avastha:** **Harvest** (kapani)
- **agami athavada:** 2 (suruvat tarikh: 2025-12-28)

tumhi ya khatancha vapar karun tumachya draksanchya pikachi yogy vadh sunishchit karu shakata.

messages.content:
તમારા પ્લોટ માટે પાણી આપવાની જરૂર છે કે નહીં તે જાણવા માટે, હું તમારા પ્લોટની હાલની જમીનની ભેજ અને લક્ષ્ય ભેજની માહિતી તપાસીશ. 

હવે હું તમારા પ્લોટ માટે આ માહિતી મેળવવા જઈ રહ્યો છું. :

તમારા પ્લોટ "jahufarm" માટે, હાલની જમીનની ભેજ 63% છે, જ્યારે લક્ષ્ય ભેજ 70% છે. 

આથી, પાણી આપવાની જરૂર છે, કારણ કે જમીનની ભેજ લક્ષ્ય ભેજની તુલનામાં ઓછી છે. 

શું તમે હવે પાણી આપવાનું ઇચ્છો છો?

messages.content:
આજના દિવસ માટે તમારા પ્લોટ "jahufarm" પર પાણી આપવાની જરૂર છે. હાલની જમીનની ભેજ 63% છે, જ્યારે લક્ષ્ય ભેજ 70% છે. 

### ફર્ટિગેશન અને કૃષિ પ્રવૃત્તિઓ:
- **ફર્ટિગેશન:** આજના દિવસે કોઈ ફર્ટિગેશનની જરૂર નથી. આગામી ફર્ટિગેશન 2025-11-28 ના રોજ "Vegetative growth" તબક્કામાં થશે.
- **કૃષિ પ્રવૃત્તિઓ:** આજે irrigation માટે 30 મિનિટનું પાણી આપ્યું છે.

જો તમને વધુ માહિતી જોઈએ કે અન્ય કોઈ મદદ જોઈએ, તો મને જણાવો!
messages.en:
For the day you need to water your plot "Jahufarm". The current soil moisture content is 63%, while the target humidity is 70%. 

### Fertilization and Agricultural Activities:
**Fertigation:** No fertigation is required today. The next fertigation will take place on 28.11.2025 in the "Vegetative Growth" phase.
- **Agricultural Activities:** 30 minutes of water has been given for irrigation today.

If you need more information or any other help, let me know!

### fertigation ane krishi pravrittio:
- **fertigation:** ajana divase koi fartigeshanani jarur nathi. agami fertigation 2025-11-28 na rose "Vegetative growth" tabakkaman thase.
- **krishi pravrittio:** aje irrigation mate 30 minitanun pani aapyu che.

messages.content:
આગળના દસ દિવસમાં તમારા પ્લોટ "jahufarm" માટે ખાતર આપવાની જરૂરિયાત નીચે મુજબ છે:

### હાલની સ્થિતિ:
- **ક્રોપ સ્ટેજ:** Crop establishment (સાંજના 2 સપ્તાહ)
- **હાલની તારીખ:** 2025-11-20

### ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ:
- **હાલમાં:** કોઈ ફર્ટિગેશનની જરૂર નથી.
- **આગામી ફર્ટિગેશન:**
  1. **તારીખ:** 2025-11-28 (સપ્તાહ 1, દિવસ 1)
     - **ખાતર:** 
       - Humic acid (HUMIC_ACID): 1 લિટર/એકર
     - **નોંધ:** ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડને અન્ય ખાતરોની એપ્લિકેશન પહેલાં 15-20 મિનિટ અલગથી લાગુ કરવું જોઈએ.
  
  2. **તારીખ:** 2025-11-28 (સપ્તાહ 1, દિવસ 4)
     - **ખાતર:** 
       - 12-61-0: 6 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
       - Urea: 7 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
     - **અથવા:**
       - 24-24-0: 16 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
     - **અથવા:**
       - Urea: 8.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
       - ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ 80%: 4.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
     - **નોંધ:** ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડને અન્ય ખાતરોની એપ્લિકેશન પહેલાં 15-20 મિનિટ અલગથી લાગુ કરવું જોઈએ.

જો તમને વધુ માહિતી જોઈએ કે અન્ય કોઈ મદદ જોઈએ, તો મને જણાવો!
messages.en:
The need to fertilize your plot "Jahufarm" in the next ten days is as follows:

### Current status:

- **Current date:** 2025-11-20

messages.en: Rain may effect to थे flowering stage
messages.standalone_question: Will rain affect the flowering stage?

messages.content:
Yes, rain can significantly affect the flowering stage of your grapes. Here are some key points to consider:

1. **Excessive Rainfall**: Too much rain can lead to waterlogging, which may cause root rot and other diseases. It can also hinder pollination and fruit set.

2. **Humidity**: High humidity levels due to rain can promote fungal diseases like powdery mildew and downy mildew, which are detrimental during the flowering stage.

3. **Nutrient Leaching**: Heavy rainfall can wash away essential nutrients from the soil, affecting the overall health of the plants.

4. **Timing**: If rain occurs during the flowering period, it can disrupt the flowering process, leading to poor fruit development.

It's essential to monitor the weather and soil conditions closely during this stage to ensure the health of your crop. If you anticipate heavy rainfall, consider implementing preventive measures against diseases and ensuring proper drainage in your fields.

messages.content:
To protect the flowering stage of your grapes from light rain and humidity, you can consider the following sprays:

1. **Fungicides**: 
   - **Copper Oxychloride**: Effective against fungal diseases like downy mildew and powdery mildew.
   - **Mancozeb**: A broad-spectrum fungicide that can help prevent various fungal infections.

2. **Insecticides**:

messages.content: Uses of this spray
messages.en: Uses of this spray
messages.standalone_question: What are the uses of the Buonos + Imidacloprid 17.8% SL + Captan combination spray?

messages.content:
The combination of Buonos + Imidacloprid 17.8% SL + Captan is typically used for the following purposes:

1. **Buonos**: This is a fungicide that helps in controlling various fungal diseases in crops, promoting healthy plant growth.

2. **Imidacloprid 17.8% SL**: This is an insecticide effective against a wide range of pests, including aphids, jassids, and other sucking insects. It works by disrupting the nervous system of the pests, leading to their death.

3. **Captan**: This is another fungicide that provides protection against fungal infections, particularly in flowering and fruiting stages, ensuring better yield and quality of the produce.

### Combined Benefits:
- **Disease Control**: The combination helps in managing both fungal diseases and insect pests simultaneously, which is crucial during the flowering stage when plants are particularly vulnerable.
- **Improved Yield**: By protecting the plants from diseases and pests, this combination can lead to healthier plants and potentially higher yields.

Always ensure to follow the recommended application rates and timings for optimal results. If you have any specific questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!

messages.content: माझ्या पिकाला पाणी द्यावे का?
messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikala pani dyave ka?

messages.content:
तुमच्या पिकांना पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही. 

1. **पेरू प्लॉट (peru plot पेरे)**: 
   - मातीतील आर्द्रता: 100% 
   - आदर्श आर्द्रता: 70% 
   - सध्या पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही.

2. **अनार प्लॉट (pomegranate डाळिंब)**: 
   - मातीतील आर्द्रता: 83% 
   - आदर्श आर्द्रता: 55% 
   - सध्या पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही.

तुमच्या पिकांची आर्द्रता आदर्श स्तरावर आहे.
messages.en:
Your crops do not need to be watered. 

1. **Peru Plot (Peru Plot Pere)**: 
   - Soil moisture: 100% 
   - Ideal humidity: 70% 
   - No watering is required at present.

2. **Pomegranate Pomegranate**: 
   - Soil Humidity: 83% 
   - Ideal humidity: 55% 
   - No watering is required at present.

The moisture content of your crops is at ideal levels.

tumachya pikanna pani denyachi aavashyakta nahi.

   - adarsh aardrata: 70% 
   - sadhya pani denyachi aavashyakta nahi.

2. **anaar plot (pomegranate dalimb)**: 
   - matitil aardrata: 83% 
   - adarsh aardrata: 55% 
   - sadhya pani denyachi aavashyakta nahi.

tumachya pikanchi aardrata adarsh staravar aahe.

messages.content: ನನ್ನ ಬೆಳೆಗಾಗಿ ಯಾವ ರಸಗೊಬ್ಬರವನ್ನು ಬಳಸಬೇಕು?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: nanna belegagi yava rasagobbaravannu balasabeku?

messages.content:
ನಿಮ್ಮ ಬೆಳೆ (ದ್ರಾಕ್ಷಿ)ಗಾಗಿ, ಈ ವಾರ (1ನೇ ವಾರ) ನೀವು ಈ ಕೆಳಗಿನ ರಸಗೊಬ್ಬರಗಳನ್ನು ಬಳಸಬಹುದು:

### 1ನೇ ವಾರ (Beginning of Bloom)
- **Mono potassium phosphate**: 3.5 kg/acre
- **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 1.5 kg/acre (ಇದನ್ನು ಇತರ ರಸಗೊಬ್ಬರಗಳನ್ನು ಬಳಸುವ 15-20 ನಿಮಿಷಗಳ ಮುಂಚೆ ಪ್ರತ್ಯೇಕವಾಗಿ ಬಳಸಬೇಕು)

### ಮುಂದಿನ ವಾರ (2ನೇ ವಾರ)
- **11-44-11**: 6.5 kg/acre
- **Calcium nitrate**: 3 kg/acre (ಇದನ್ನು ಇತರ ರಸಗೊಬ್ಬರಗಳನ್ನು ಬಳಸುವ 15-20 ನಿಮಿಷಗಳ ನಂತರ ಪ್ರತ್ಯೇಕವಾಗಿ ಬಳಸಬೇಕು)
- **Sulfate of Potash**: 3.5 kg/acre

ಈ ಮಾಹಿತಿಯನ್ನು ಆಧರಿಸಿ, ನೀವು ನಿಮ್ಮ ಬೆಳೆಗಳಿಗೆ ಸೂಕ್ತವಾದ ರಸಗೊಬ್ಬರವನ್ನು ಆಯ್ಕೆ ಮಾಡಬಹುದು.
messages.en:
For your crop (grapes), you can use the following fertilizers this week (1st week):

### Week 1 (Beginning of Bloom)
- **Mono potassium phosphate**: 3.5 kg/acre
- **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 1.5 kg/acre (it should be used separately 15-20 minutes before using other fertilizers)

### Next week (2nd week)
- **11-44-11**: 6.5 kg/acre
- **Calcium nitrate**: 3 kg/acre (it should be used separately 15-20 minutes after using other fertilizers)
- **Sulfate of Potash**: 3.5 kg/acre

Based on this information, you can choose the appropriate fertilizer for your crops.
messages.content_transliterated:
nimma bele (drakshi)gagi, e vara (1ne vara) neevu e kelagina rasagobbaragalannu balasabahudu:

### 1ne vara (Beginning of Bloom)
- **Mono potassium phosphate**: 3.5 kg/acre
- **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 1.5 kg/acre (idannu itara rasagobbaragalannu balasuva 15-20 nimishagal munche pratyekavagi balasabeku)

### mundina vara (2ne vara)
- **11-44-11**: 6.5 kg/acre
- **Calcium nitrate**: 3 kg/acre (idannu itara rasagobbaragalannu balasuva 15-20 nimishagal nantara pratyekavagi balasabeku)
- **Sulfate of Potash**: 3.5 kg/acre

e mahitiannu adharisi, neevu nimma belegalige suktavada rasagobbaravannu ayke madabahudu.

messages.content:
The image shows signs of potential pest activity on the leaves, likely indicating the presence of pests such as aphids or leafhoppers. The leaves appear to have some curling and discoloration, which can be symptoms of pest damage.

Since the crop appears to be in the vegetative stage, it's important to address this issue promptly to prevent further damage. Here are some general recommendations:

1. **Manual Inspection**: Check the plants closely for any visible pests and remove them manually if possible.
2. **Insecticidal Soap**: Use a mild insecticidal soap to help control soft-bodied insects.
3. **Neem Oil**: This is a natural pesticide that can help deter various pests.

For a more effective treatment, I recommend consulting with a local agricultural expert or extension service for tailored advice and specific products available in your area. If you can provide a clearer image focusing on the affected areas, I may be able to give a more precise analysis.

messages.content:
તમે અપલોડ કરેલી છબીમાં પાનાં પર કીટકની પ્રવૃત્તિના સંકેતો દેખાઈ રહ્યા છે, જે કદાચ આફિડ અથવા પાનાંના હોપર્સ જેવા કીટકોની હાજરી દર્શાવે છે. પાનાંઓમાં થોડી વળાંક અને રંગમાં ફેરફાર છે, જે કીટકના નુકસાનના લક્ષણો હોઈ શકે છે.

આ સમસ્યાને ઝડપથી ઉકેલવા માટે અહીં કેટલીક સામાન્ય ભલામણો છે:

1. **હાથથી તપાસ**: છોડને નજીકથી તપાસો અને જો કોઈ દૃશ્યમાન કીટકો હોય તો તેમને હાથથી દૂર કરો.
2. **ઇન્સેક્ટિસાઇડ સોપ**: નરમ શરીરના કીટકોને નિયંત્રિત કરવા માટે હળવા ઇન્સેક્ટિસાઇડ સોપનો ઉપયોગ કરો.
3. **નીમ તેલ**: આ એક કુદરતી કીટકનાશક છે જે વિવિધ કીટકોને દૂર કરવામાં મદદ કરી શકે છે.

વધુ અસરકારક સારવાર માટે, હું સ્થાનિક કૃષિ નિષ્ણાત અથવા વિસ્તરણ સેવા સાથે સંપર્ક કરવા માટે ભલામણ કરું છું, જેથી તમારા વિસ્તારમાં ઉપલબ્ધ વિશિષ્ટ ઉત્પાદનો માટે કસ્ટમાઇઝ કરેલ સલાહ મળી શકે. જો તમે વધુ સ્પષ્ટ છબી આપી શકો છો જે અસરગ્રસ્ત વિસ્તારો પર કેન્દ્રિત હોય, તો હું વધુ ચોક્કસ વિશ્લેષણ આપી શકું છું.
messages.en:
The image you uploaded shows signs of insect activity on the page, which probably indicates the presence of insects such as aphids or page hoppers. There is a slight curve and change in colour in the leaves, which may be symptoms of insect damage.

Here are some general recommendations to solve this problem quickly:

1. **Hand check**: Inspect the plants closely and remove them by hand if there are any visible insects.
2. **Insecticide Soap**: Use mild insecticide soap to control soft body insects.
3. **Neem oil**: This is a natural insecticide that can help to get rid of various insects.

For a more effective treatment, I recommend contacting a local agricultural specialist or extension service to get customized advice for specific products available in your area. If you can give a clearer image that focuses on the affected areas, I can give a more accurate analysis.

messages.content: ನಾನು ನನ್ನ ಬೆಳೆಗೆ ನೀರು ಹಾಕಬೇಕೆ?
messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: nanu nanna belege neeru hakabeke?

messages.content:
ನೀವು ನಿಮ್ಮ ಬೆಳೆಗೆ ನೀರು ಹಾಕಬೇಕೆಂದು ತಿಳಿಯಲು, ಈ ಮಾಹಿತಿ ಇದೆ:

1. **Iranna Plot**: ನಿಮ್ಮ ಪ್ಲಾಟ್‌ಗಾಗಿ ನೀರು ಹಾಕುವ ಶ್ರೇಣಿಯ ಮಾಹಿತಿ ಲಭ್ಯವಿಲ್ಲ, ಏಕೆಂದರೆ ನಿಮ್ಮ ಪ್ಲಾಟ್ ರೀಚಾರ್ಜ್ ಅವಧಿ ಮುಗಿಯಾಗಿದೆ. ದಯವಿಟ್ಟು ಡೇಟಾವನ್ನು ನೋಡಲು ಪುನಃ ರೀಚಾರ್ಜ್ ಮಾಡಿ.

2. **Sanganna Plot**: 
   - ಮಣ್ಣು ತೇವಾಂಶ: 12 kPa (ಮಣ್ಣು ಒಣವಾಗಿದೆ) ಮತ್ತು 32 kPa (ಮಣ್ಣು ಒಣವಾಗಿದೆ).
   - ಆಪ್ಟಿಮಲ್ ತೇವಾಂಶ: 20 kPa.
   - ನೀರು ಹಾಕಬಹುದು, ಏಕೆಂದರೆ ಮಣ್ಣು ತೇವಾಂಶವು ಒಣ ಆಪ್ಟಿಮಲ್ kPa ಮೌಲ್ಯಗಳ ಮೇಲೆ ಇದೆ.

ಹೀಗಾಗಿ, **Sanganna Plot** ಗೆ ನೀರು ಹಾಕಬಹುದು, ಆದರೆ **Iranna Plot** ಗೆ ನೀರು ಹಾಕಲು ಮುಂಚೆ ಪುನಃ ರೀಚಾರ್ಜ್ ಮಾಡಬೇಕು.
messages.en:
To know how you need to water your crop, here's the information:

1. **Iranna Plot**: The water supply range information for your plot is not available, as your plot recharge period has expired. Please recharge to see the data.

2. **Sanganna Plot**: 
   - Soil moisture: 12 kPa (soil is dry) and 32 kPa (soil is dry).
   - Optimal humidity: 20 kPa.
   - Water can be applied, as the soil moisture is above the dry optimal kPa values.

Thus, **Sanganna Plot** can be watered, but **Iranna Plot** has to be recharged before watering.
messages.content_transliterated:
neevu nimma belege neeru hakabekendu thiliyalu, e mahiti ide:

1. **Iranna Plot**: nimma platgagi neeru hakuv shreniya mahiti labhyavilla, ekendare nimma plot recharge avadhi mugiagide. dayavittu daytavannu nodalu punah recharge madi.

2. **Sanganna Plot**: 
   - mannu tevansh: 12 kPa (mannu onavagide) mattu 32 kPa (mannu onavagide).
   - optimal tevansh: 20 kPa.
   - neeru hakabahudu, ekendare mannu thevanshavu on optimal kPa maulyagala mele ide.

higagi, **Sanganna Plot** ge neeru hakabahudu, adare **Iranna Plot** ge neeru hakalu munche punah recharge madabeku.

messages.content: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikasathi conte khat vaparave?

messages.content:
तुमच्या "Manik Chaman Plot" साठी, सध्या तुम्ही "Beginning of Bloom" या पिकाच्या टप्प्यात आहात, जो 2025-11-19 पासून सुरू झाला आहे. 

### सध्याचा फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल (सप्ताह 1):
1. **फर्टिलायझर**:
   - **Mono potassium phosphate**: 3 kg/acre
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 1 kg/acre (हे इतर खतांच्या वापरापूर्वी 15-20 मिनिटे स्वतंत्रपणे लागू करावे)

### पुढील फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल (सप्ताह 2):
- **फर्टिलायझर**:
   - **11-44-11**: 5.5 kg/acre
   - **Calcium nitrate**: 3 kg/acre (हे इतर खतांच्या वापरानंतर 15-20 मिनिटे स्वतंत्रपणे लागू करावे)
   - **Sulfate of Potash**: 3 kg/acre

तुमच्या पिकाच्या आवश्यकतांनुसार हे खत वापरा.
messages.en:
For your "Manik Chaman Plot", you are currently in the "Beginning of Bloom" crop phase, which has started from 2025-11-19. 

### Current Fertigation Schedule (Week 1):
1. **Fertilizer**:
   - **Mono potassium phosphate**: 3 kg/acre
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 1 kg/acre (this should be applied separately for 15-20 minutes before use of other fertilizers)

### Next Fertigation Schedule (Week 2):
- **Fertilizer**:
   - **11-44-11**: 5.5 kg/acre
   - **Calcium nitrate**: 3 kg/acre (this should be applied separately for 15-20 minutes after use of other fertilizers)
   - **Sulfate of Potash**: 3 kg/acre

Use this fertilizer according to the requirements of your crop.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya "Manik Chaman Plot" sathi, sadhya tumhi "Beginning of Bloom" ya pikachya tappyat aahat, joe 2025-11-19 pasun suru jhala aahe. 

### sadhyacha fertigation schedule (saptah 1):
1. **fertilizer**:
   - **Mono potassium phosphate**: 3 kg/acre
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 1 kg/acre (hey itar khatanchya vaparapurvi 15-20 minite swatantrapane lagoo karave)

### pudhil fertigation schedule (saptah 2):
- **fertilizer**:
   - **11-44-11**: 5.5 kg/acre
   - **Calcium nitrate**: 3 kg/acre (hey itar khatanchya vaparanantar 15-20 minite swatantrapane lagoo karave)
   - **Sulfate of Potash**: 3 kg/acre

tumachya pikachya aavashyakatannusar hey khat vapara.

messages.en: The situation of watering the crop of your "SNN plot no 1" is such that the current field data is not up to date. Because, the most recent data was received 37.43 hours ago. Possible reasons for this are: network issues, equipment issues, low battery, or the recharge plan is dead. If you want a solution to this problem, you can open a support ticket.

messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?

messages.content:
तुमच्या "थॉम्पसन" द्राक्षांच्या पिकासाठी, सध्या तुम्ही "शूट विकास" (Shoot Development) या टप्प्यात आहात, जो 3 व्या आठवड्यात आहे. 

### सध्याचा खत वापर:
- **फोलिअर पद्धतीने**:
  - **Solubor**: 300 ग्रॅम/एकर
  - **Gibberellic acid (GA3)**: 15 ppm/प्लांट

**महत्वाची नोट**: फोलिअर स्प्रेमध्ये सूक्ष्म-खतांचा एकाग्रता 1% पेक्षा जास्त नसावा, म्हणजेच 500 लिटर पाण्यात 5 किलो.

### पुढील खत वापर:
- **"बloom सुरूवात" (Beginning of Bloom)** या टप्प्यात, जो 2025-12-04 पासून सुरू होईल:
  - **फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने**:
    - **Mono potassium phosphate**: 3.5 किलो/एकर
    - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 1.5 किलो/एकर (इतर खतांच्या वापरापूर्वी 15-20 मिनिटे वेगळे लागू करावे)
  
तुमच्या पिकाच्या गरजेनुसार हे खत वापरा.
messages.en:
For your "Thompson" grape crop, you are currently in the "Shoot Development" phase, which is in week 3. 

### Current Fertilizer Usage:
- **Foliar Method**:
  - **Solubor**: 300 g/acre
  - **Gibberellic acid (GA3)**: 15 ppm/plant

**Important Note**: The concentration of micro-fertilizers in foliar spray should not exceed 1%, i.e. 5 kg in 500 liters of water.

### Use the next fertilizer:
- **"Beginning of Bloom"** In this phase, which will begin on 2025-12-04:
  - **Fertigation Method**:
    - **Mono potassium phosphate**: 3.5 kg/acre
    - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 1.5 kg/acre (to be applied separately 15-20 minutes before use of other fertilizers)
  
Use this fertilizer according to the needs of your crop.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya "thompson" drakshanchya pikasathi, sadhya tumhi "shoot vikas" (Shoot Development) ya tappyat aahat, joe 3 vya aathvadyat aahe. 

### sadhyacha khat vapar:
- **follier paddhatine**:
  - **Solubor**: 300 gram/acre
  - **Gibberellic acid (GA3)**: 15 ppm/plant

**mahatvachi note**: follier spremadhye sukshma-khatancha ekagrata 1% peksha jast nasava, mhanjech 500 litre panyat 5 kilo.

### pudhil khat vapar:
- **"bloom suruvat" (Beginning of Bloom)** ya tappyat, joe 2025-12-04 pasun suru hoyil:
  - **fertigation paddhatine**:
    - **Mono potassium phosphate**: 3.5 kilo/acre
    - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 1.5 kilo/acre (itar khatanchya vaparapurvi 15-20 minite vegale lagoo karave)
  
tumachya pikachya garjenusar hey khat vapara.

messages.content: Precaution on next after two days rain and foggy
messages.en: Precaution on next after two days rain and foggy
messages.standalone_question: What precautions should I take after two days of rain and fog?

messages.content:
After two days of rain and fog, here are some precautions and recommendations for your plot "Shashidhar thomson 3 acar":

1. **Monitor Soil Moisture**: Check the soil moisture levels, as rain may have saturated the soil. Ensure that it is not overly wet, which can lead to root rot.

2. **Pest and Disease Watch**: 
   - There are currently no specific disease or pest spray recommendations for the upcoming week. However, keep an eye out for any signs of fungal diseases or pests that thrive in humid conditions.
   - Regularly inspect your grapevines for any unusual spots or pests.

3. **Spray Conditions**: 
   - The spray conditions are currently moderate, but they improve to ideal conditions later in the evening. If you need to apply any treatments, consider doing so during the ideal conditions, especially between 6:30 PM and 4:30 AM when conditions are optimal.

4. **Farm Activities**: 
   - There are no scheduled farm activities for the upcoming week, but you may want to plan for any necessary maintenance or monitoring of your crops.

5. **General Maintenance**: 
   - Ensure that your irrigation system is functioning properly, as heavy rain can sometimes cause blockages or malfunctions.

By following these precautions, you can help ensure the health and productivity of your grape crop. If you have any specific concerns or need further assistance, feel free to ask!

messages.content: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikasathi conte khat vaparave?

messages.content:
तुमच्या पिकासाठी (द्राक्षे) सध्या कोणतेही खत लागू करण्याची आवश्यकता नाही. तुमच्या पिकाची सध्या "कैन थिनिंग" (Cane thinning) अवस्था आहे, जी 5 नोव्हेंबर 2025 पासून सुरू झाली आहे.

तुमच्या पुढील फर्टिगेशनची वेळ "सबसं" (Subcane) अवस्थेसाठी आहे, जी 19 नोव्हेंबर 2025 पासून सुरू झाली आहे. पुढील फर्टिगेशनसाठी खालील खतांचा वापर करावा:

1. **Mono potassium phosphate** - 5.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
2. **0-60-20** - 4.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **Sulfate of Potash** - 1 किलोग्राम/एकर
3. **Phosphoric acid 80%** - 3.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **Sulfate of Potash** - 3 किलोग्राम/एकर

**महत्वाची नोट:** फर्टिगेशनच्या इतर खतांच्या वापरापूर्वी, फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल 15-20 मिनिटे आधी लागू करणे आवश्यक आहे.

तुमच्या पिकाच्या वाढीच्या अवस्थेनुसार हे खत वापरा.
messages.en:
There is currently no need to apply any fertilizer to your crop (grapes). Your crop is currently in the "can thinning" stage, which has started from November 5, 2025.

The timing of your next fertigation is for the "subcane" stage, which has started from November 19, 2025. The following fertilizers should be used for further fertigation:

1. **Mono potassium phosphate** - 5.5 kg/acre
2. **0-60-20** - 4.5kg/acre
   - **Sulfate of Potash** - 1 kg/acre
3. **Phosphoric acid 80%** - 3.5kg/acre
   - **Sulfate of Potash** - 3 kg/acre

**Important Note:** Before the use of other fertilizers of fertigation, phosphoric acid must be applied 15-20 minutes beforehand.

Use this fertilizer according to the growth stage of your crop.

tumachya pudhil fertigationchy vale "sabasam" (Subcane) avasthesathi aahe, ji 19 novehember 2025 pasun suru jhali ahe. pudhil fertigationsathy khalil khatancha vapar karava:

1. **Mono potassium phosphate** - 5.5 kilogram/acre
2. **0-60-20** - 4.5 kilograms/acre
   - **Sulfate of Potash** - 1 kilogram/acre
3. **Phosphoric acid 80%** - 3.5 kilogram/acre
   - **Sulfate of Potash** - 3 kilogram/acre

**mahatvachi note:** fertigationchya itar khatanchya vaparapurvi, phosphoric omle 15-20 minite aadhi lagoo karne avashyak ahe.

tumachya pikachya vadhichya avasthenusar hey khat vapara.

     - **Next Week (Week 3)**:

       - Gibberellic acid (GA3): 15 ppm/plant

3. **Farmer Activities**: No specific activities are scheduled for today.

4. **Spray Conditions**: Unable to check spray conditions at this time.

If you have any further questions or need assistance with anything else, feel free to ask!

messages.content: ನಾನು ನಿಮ್ಮ "Thomson Plot no 1" ಗೆ ನೀರು ಹಾಕಬೇಕೆಂದು ತಿಳಿಯಲು ಸಾಧ್ಯವಾಗುತ್ತಿಲ್ಲ, ಏಕೆಂದರೆ ಆ plot ಗೆ ಸಂಬಂಧಿಸಿದಂತೆ ಆಪ್ಟಿಮಲ್ ತೇವಾಂಶವನ್ನು ಕಂಡುಹಿಡಿಯಲಾಗಿಲ್ಲ. ದಯವಿಟ್ಟು ಇನ್ನಷ್ಟು ಮಾಹಿತಿಯನ್ನು ಪರಿಶೀಲಿಸಲು ಅಥವಾ ನಿಮ್ಮ plot ಗೆ ಸಂಬಂಧಿಸಿದಂತೆ ತೇವಾಂಶವನ್ನು ಪರಿಶೀಲಿಸಲು ನನಗೆ ತಿಳಿಸಿ.
messages.en: I don't know if you need to water your "Thomson Plot No 1" because the optimal moisture content for that plot has not been detected. Please let me know to check more information or check the moisture content with respect to your plot.
messages.content_transliterated: nanu nimma "Thomson Plot no 1" ge neeru hakabekendu thiliyalu sadhyavaguttilla, ekendare a plot ge sambandhisidante optimal thevanshavannu kanduhidiyalagilla. dayavittu innashtu mahitiannu parishilisalu athava nimma plot ge sambandhisidante thevanshavannu parishilisalu nanage thilisi.

messages.content: ನನ್ನ ಬೆಳೆಗಾಗಿ ಯಾವ ರಸಗೊಬ್ಬರವನ್ನು ಬಳಸಬೇಕು?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: nanna belegagi yava rasagobbaravannu balasabeku?

messages.content:
ನಿಮ್ಮ ಬೆಳೆ (ದ್ರಾಕ್ಷಿ)ಗಾಗಿ, ಈ ವಾರ (2ನೇ ವಾರ) ನೀವು ಈ ಕೆಳಗಿನ ರಸಗೊಬ್ಬರಗಳನ್ನು ಬಳಸಬಹುದು:

### 2ನೇ ವಾರದ ಫರ್ಟಿಗೇಶನ್ ಶೆಡ್ಯೂಲ್:
- **ಚಟುವಟಿಕೆ**: ಶೂಟ್ ಅಭಿವೃದ್ಧಿ
- **ರಸಗೊಬ್ಬರಗಳು**:
  - **ಜಿಂಕ್ ಆಕ್ಸೈಡ್**: 200 ಗ್ರಾಂ/ಎಕರೆ
  - **ಗಿಬೆರಲಿಕ್ ಆಮ್ಲ (GA3)**: 10 ppm/ಗಿಡ

**ಗಮನಿಸಿ**: ಫೋಲಿಯರ್ ಸ್ಪ್ರೇಗೆ ಬಳಸುವ ಮೈಕ್ರೋ-ಪೋಷಕ ರಸಗೊಬ್ಬರಗಳ ಕ 농ನ 1% ಕ್ಕಿಂತ ಹೆಚ್ಚು ಇರಬಾರದು, ಉದಾಹರಣೆಗೆ 500 ಲೀಟರ್ ನೀರಿನಲ್ಲಿ 5 ಕಿ.ಗ್ರಾಂ.

### ಮುಂದಿನ ವಾರ (3ನೇ ವಾರ) ಶೆಡ್ಯೂಲ್:
- **ಚಟುವಟಿಕೆ**: ಶೂಟ್ ಅಭಿವೃದ್ಧಿ
- **ರಸಗೊಬ್ಬರಗಳು**:
  - **ಸೋಲ್ಯೂಬರ್**: 300 ಗ್ರಾಂ/ಎಕರೆ
  - **ಗಿಬೆರಲಿಕ್ ಆಮ್ಲ (GA3)**: 15 ppm/ಗಿಡ

ಈ ಮಾಹಿತಿಯನ್ನು ಗಮನದಲ್ಲಿಟ್ಟುಕೊಂಡು, ನಿಮ್ಮ ಬೆಳೆಗಳಿಗೆ ಸೂಕ್ತವಾದ ರಸಗೊಬ್ಬರವನ್ನು ಬಳಸಬಹುದು.
messages.en:
For your crop (grapes), you can use the following fertilizers this week (2nd week):

### Week 2nd Fertigation Schedule:
- **Activity**: Shoot development
- **Fertilizers**:
  - **Zinc Oxide**: 200 g/acre
  - **Gibberellic acid (GA3)**: 10 ppm/plant

**Note**: No more than 1% of the amount of micro-nutrient fertilizers used for foliar spray, for example 500 kg in 5 liters of water.

### Next week (3rd week) schedule:
- **Activity**: Shoot development
- **Fertilizers**:
  - **Soluber**: 300 g/acre
  - **Gibberellic acid (GA3)**: 15 ppm/plant

Keeping this information in mind, you can use the appropriate fertilizer for your crops.

### mundina vara (3ne vara) schedule:

messages.content:
तुमच्या "plot no. 1 (manik chaman)" या पिकासाठी, सध्या तुम्ही "Beginning of Bloom" या अवस्थेत आहात, जी 2025-11-13 पासून सुरू झाली आहे. या अवस्थेत, तुम्हाला खालील खतांचा वापर करावा लागेल:

### सध्याचा फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल:
- **खत**: 
  - 11-44-11: 5.5 kg/acre
  - Calcium nitrate: 3 kg/acre
  - Sulfate of Potash: 3 kg/acre

**महत्वाची नोट्स**:
- फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल (Phosphoric acid) इतर खतांच्या वापरापूर्वी 15-20 मिनिटे वेगळे लागू करावे.
- कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट (Calcium nitrate) इतर खतांच्या वापरानंतर 15-20 मिनिटे वेगळे लागू करावे.

### पुढील फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल:
- **अवस्था**: Fruit Set (सुरुवात 2025-12-04)
- **खत**:
  - 11-44-11: 5.5 kg/acre
  - Calcium nitrate: 3 kg/acre
  - Sulfate of Potash: 3 kg/acre
  - Magnesium Sulphate: 1 kg/acre

तुमच्या पिकाच्या गरजेनुसार हे खत वापरा.
messages.en:
For your crop "Plot No. 1 (Manik Chaman)", you are currently in the "Beginning of Bloom" stage, which started from 2025-11-13. At this stage, you will need to use the following fertilizers:

### Current Fertigation Schedule:
-**Letter**: 
  - 11-44-11: 5.5 kg/acre
  - Calcium nitrate: 3 kg/acre
  - Sulfate of Potash: 3 kg/acre

**Important Notes**:
- Phosphoric acid should be applied separately for 15-20 minutes before use of other fertilizers.
- Calcium nitrate should be applied separately for 15-20 minutes after the use of other fertilizers.

### Next Fertigation Schedule:
- **Stage**: Fruit Set (Started 2025-12-04)
-**Letter**:
  - 11-44-11: 5.5 kg/acre
  - Calcium nitrate: 3 kg/acre
  - Sulfate of Potash: 3 kg/acre
  - Magnesium Sulphate: 1 kg/acre

Use this fertilizer according to the needs of your crop.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya "plot no. 1 (manik chaman)" ya pikasathi, sadhya tumhi "Beginning of Bloom" ya avasthet aahat, ji 2025-11-13 pasun suru jhali ahe. ya avasthet, tumhala khalil khatancha vapar karava lagel:

### sadhyacha fertigation schedule:
- **khat**: 
  - 11-44-11: 5.5 kg/acre
  - Calcium nitrate: 3 kg/acre
  - Sulfate of Potash: 3 kg/acre

**mahatvachi notes**:
- phosphoric omle (Phosphoric acid) itar khatanchya vaparapurvi 15-20 minite vegale lagoo karave.
- calcium nitrate (Calcium nitrate) itar khatanchya vaparanantar 15-20 minite vegale lagoo karave.

### pudhil fertigation schedule:
- **avastha**: Fruit Set (suruvat 2025-12-04)
- **khat**:
  - 11-44-11: 5.5 kg/acre
  - Calcium nitrate: 3 kg/acre
  - Sulfate of Potash: 3 kg/acre
  - Magnesium Sulphate: 1 kg/acre

tumachya pikachya garjenusar hey khat vapara.

- **Plot No.2 Mama Jambo**: सध्या फर्टिगेशनची आवश्यकता नाही. पुढील फर्टिगेशन "फ्रूट प्रूनिंग" साठी आहे.
- **Plot No.1 Sudhakar**: सध्या फर्टिगेशनची आवश्यकता नाही. पुढील फर्टिगेशन "सबकन" साठी आहे.

### स्प्रे कंडीशन्स:

messages.en:
Whether your crop needs to be watered is as follows:

### Water Needs:
1. **Plot No.3 kalam Jambo**: 
   - **Soil Moistur**: 1 kPa (very moist)
   - **Optimal**: 25 kPa
   - **Watering is not necessary**.

2. **Plot No 4 Sharad**: 
   - **Soil Moistur**: 9 kPa (very moist)
   - **Optimal**: 30 kPa
   - **Watering is not necessary**.

3. **Plot No.2 Mama Jambo**: 
   - **Soil Moistur**: 11 kPa (very moist)
   - **Optimal**: 25 kPa
   - **Watering is not necessary**.

4. **Plot No.1 Sudhakar**: 
   - **Soil Moisture**: 33 kPa (slightly dry)
   - **Optimal**: 30 kPa
   - **Watering is required**.

- **Plot No.3 Kalam Jambo**: No fertigation is required at present. The next fertigation is for "fruit pruning".
- **Plot No 4 Sharad**: No fertigation is currently required. The next fertigation is for "subcon".
- **Plot No.2 Mama Jambo**: No fertigation is required at present. The next fertigation is for "fruit pruning".
- **Plot No.1 Sudhakar**: No fertigation is required at present. The next fertigation is for "subcon".

### Spray Conditions:
- **Plot No.1 Sudhakar**: Today is the best situation to spray, especially between 4:30 and 6:30 pm.

You need to give water only for **Plot No.1 Sudhakar**. Water is not required for other plots.

messages.content: भुरी डाउनी आहे
messages.en: Brown is downy
messages.standalone_question: Is there powdery mildew present?
messages.content_transliterated: bhuri downey aahe

messages.content:
भुरी डाउनी (Downy Mildew) एक सामान्य रोग आहे जो विविध पिकांवर आढळतो. यावर नियंत्रण ठेवण्यासाठी योग्य औषधांचा वापर करणे आवश्यक आहे. 

तुमच्या पिकासाठी योग्य औषध आणि त्याची वेळ जाणून घेण्यासाठी, कृपया तुमच्या प्लॉटची माहिती द्या, म्हणजे मी तुम्हाला अधिक माहिती देऊ शकेन.
messages.en:
Downy mildew is a common disease that occurs on various crops. It is essential to use the right medications to control it. 

To know the right medicine and timing for your crop, please provide information about your plot, so that I can give you more information.
messages.content_transliterated:
bhuri downey (Downy Mildew) ek samany rog aahe joe vividh pikanvar adhalato. yavar niyantran thevanyasathi yogy ausadhancha vapar karane avashyak aahe. 

tumachya pikasathi yogy ausadh ani tyachi vel janun ghenyasathi, kripaya tumachya plotchy mahiti dya, mhanaje me tumhala adhik mahiti deu shaken.

messages.en: Should I water my crop?

messages.content_transliterated: nanu nanna belege neeru hakabeke?

messages.content:
ನೀವು ನೀರು ಹಾಕಬೇಕೆಂದು ಕೇಳಿದಾಗ, ನಿಮ್ಮ ಎರಡು plots ಗೆ ನೀರಿನ ಅಗತ್ಯವನ್ನು ಪರಿಶೀಲಿಸಲಾಗಿದೆ:

1. **Iranna Plot**: ನಿಮ್ಮ plot recharge ಮುಗಿಯಾಗಿದೆ, ದಯವಿಟ್ಟು ಡೇಟಾವನ್ನು ನೋಡಲು ಪುನಃ ಚಾರ್ಜ್ ಮಾಡಿ.
   
2. **Sanganna Plot**: 
   - ಮಣ್ಣು ತೇವಾಂಶ: 4 kPa (ಮಣ್ಣು ತೇವಾಂಶ 1), 2 kPa (ಮಣ್ಣು ತೇವಾಂಶ 2)
   - ಆಪ್ಟಿಮಲ್ ತೇವಾಂಶ: 20 kPa (ಎರಡು ತೇವಾಂಶಗಳಿಗೆ)
   - **ನೀರು ಹಾಕಲು ಅಗತ್ಯವಿಲ್ಲ** ಏಕೆಂದರೆ ತೇವಾಂಶವು ಶ್ರೇಣಿಯಲ್ಲಿದೆ.

ಹೀಗಾಗಿ, ನೀವು ಈಗ ನೀರು ಹಾಕಬೇಕಾಗಿಲ್ಲ.
messages.en:
When you are asked to water it, the water requirement for your two plots is checked:

1. **Iranna Plot**: Your plot recharge is complete, please recharge to see the data.
   
2. **Sanganna Plot**: 
   - Soil moisture: 4 kPa (soil moisture 1), 2 kPa (soil moisture 2)
   - Optimal humidity: 20 kPa (for two humidities)
   - **No need to water** because the moisture is in range.

Thus, you don't have to water now.
messages.content_transliterated:
neevu neeru hakabekendu kelidaga, nimma eradu plots ge neerina agatyavannu parishilisalagide:

1. **Iranna Plot**: nimma plot recharge mugiagide, dayavittu daytavannu nodalu punah charged madi.
   
2. **Sanganna Plot**: 
   - mannu tevansh: 4 kPa (mannu tevansh 1), 2 kPa (mannu tevansh 2)
   - optimal tevansh: 20 kPa (eradu tevanshagalige)
   - **neeru hakalu agatyavilla** ekendare thevanshavu sreniyallide.

higagi, neevu eega neeru hakabekagilla.

messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should be applied to my "suoar sonaka" crop?

messages.content:
आपल्या "suoar sonaka" पिकासाठी, सध्या "Foundation Pruning" या टप्प्यात (आठवडा 2) खालील खते लागू करणे आवश्यक आहे:

### Fertigation Schedule:
1. **खते**:
   - **12-61-0**: 4 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **Calcium nitrate**: 18 किलोग्राम/एकर

   किंवा

   - **24-24-0**: 10.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **Calcium nitrate**: 5 किलोग्राम/एकर

   किंवा

   - **Calcium nitrate**: 21.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 3 किलोग्राम/एकर

### नोट्स:
- **Phosphoric acid**: इतर खते लागू करण्यापूर्वी 15-20 मिनिटे वेगळे लागू करावे.
- **Calcium nitrate**: इतर खते लागू केल्यानंतर 15-20 मिनिटे वेगळे लागू करावे.

आपण या खते आपल्या पिकावर लागू करणे सुनिश्चित करा.
messages.en:
For your "suoar sonaka" crop, it is currently necessary to apply the following fertilizers during the "Foundation Pruning" phase (week 2):

### Fertigation Schedule:
1. **Fertilizers**:
   - **12-61-0**: 4 kg/acre
   - **Calcium nitrate**: 18 kg/acre

or

- **24-24-0**: 10.5 kg/acre
   - **Calcium nitrate**: 5 kg/acre

or

- **Calcium nitrate**: 21.5 kg/acre
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 3 kg/acre

### Notes:
- **Phosphoric acid**: Apply separately for 15-20 minutes before applying other fertilizers.
- **Calcium nitrate**: Apply separately for 15-20 minutes after applying other fertilizers.

Make sure you apply these fertilizers to your crop.

apalya "suoar sonaka" pikasathi, sadhya "Foundation Pruning" ya tappyat (athavada 2) khalil khate lagoo karne avashyak ahe:

### Fertigation Schedule:
1. **khate**:
   - **12-61-0**: 4 kilogram/acre
   - **Calcium nitrate**: 18 kilogram/acre

kinva

- **24-24-0**: 10.5 kilogram/acre
   - **Calcium nitrate**: 5 kilogram/acre

kinva

- **Calcium nitrate**: 21.5 kilogram/acre
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 3 kilogram/acre

### notes:
- **Phosphoric acid**: itar khate lagoo karanyapurvi 15-20 minite vegale lagoo karave.
- **Calcium nitrate**: itar khate lagoo kelyanantar 15-20 minite vegale lagoo karave.

messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikasathi conte khat vaparave?

messages.content:
आपल्या पिकासाठी (द्राक्षे) खालील खतांचा वापर करावा:

### सध्या (सप्ताह 2):
- **फोलिअर पद्धतीने**:
  - **जिंक ऑक्साइड**: 200 ग्रॅम/एकर
  - **गिब्बेरलिक आम्ल (GA3)**: 10 ppm/प्लांट

### पुढील वेळापत्रक (सप्ताह 3):
- **फोलिअर पद्धतीने**:
  - **सोल्यूबॉर**: 300 ग्रॅम/एकर
  - **गिब्बेरलिक आम्ल (GA3)**: 15 ppm/प्लांट

### नोट्स:
- फोलिअर स्प्रेमध्ये सूक्ष्म-खतांचा एकाग्रता 1% पेक्षा जास्त नसावा, उदाहरणार्थ 500 लिटर पाण्यात 5 किलो.

आपल्या पिकाच्या सध्याच्या अवस्थेचा विचार करता, हे खत वापरणे उपयुक्त ठरेल.
messages.en:
The following fertilizers should be used for your crop (grapes):

### Currently (Week 2):
- **Foliar Method**:
  - **Zinc oxide**: 200 g/acre
  - **Gibberellic acid (GA3)**: 10 ppm/plant

### Next schedule (week 3):
- **Foliar Method**:
  - **Solubor**: 300 g/acre
  - **Gibberellic acid (GA3)**: 15 ppm/plant

### Notes:
The concentration of micro-fertilizers in foliar sprays should not exceed 1%, for example 5 kg in 500 liters of water.

messages.content: Should I water my crop?
messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?

messages.content:
For your plot "Heer farm":

- **Soil Moisture Readings**: 
  - Sensor 1: 52% 
  - Sensor 2: 30% 
- **Optimal Moisture**: 65% for both sensors.

Watering can be done since the moisture level in Sensor 2 is below the dry optimal percentage (30%). However, there may be a possible issue with the sensor readings, as it indicates that the value is too dry. Please check the sensor for any damage or if it was exposed to air.

If needed, you can raise a support ticket to resolve this issue.
messages.en:

messages.content:
आपल्या "Manikchaman plot no 2" पिकाला पाणी देणे आवश्यक आहे. सध्या, मातीतील आर्द्रता खालीलप्रमाणे आहे:

- मातीतील आर्द्रता 1: 45% (आवश्यक 60% पेक्षा कमी)
- मातीतील आर्द्रता 2: 98% (आवश्यक 60% पेक्षा जास्त)

त्यामुळे, पाणी देणे योग्य आहे.
messages.en:
Your "Manikchaman plot no 2" crop needs to be watered. Currently, soil moisture content is as follows:

Soil moisture 1: 45% (less than the required 60%)
Soil moisture 2: 98% (more than the required 60%)

Therefore, watering is appropriate.

messages.content: ನಾನು ನನ್ನ ಬೆಳೆಗೆ ನೀರು ಹಾಕಬೇಕೆ?

messages.content_transliterated: nanu nanna belege neeru hakabeke?

messages.content: ನೀವು ನಿಮ್ಮ ಬೆಳೆಗೆ ನೀರು ಹಾಕಬೇಕಾಗಿಲ್ಲ. ನಿಮ್ಮ "super plot" ನಲ್ಲಿ, ಮಣ್ಣಿನ ತೇವಾಂಶ 100% ಮತ್ತು 88% ಇದೆ, ಮತ್ತು ಶ್ರೇಷ್ಟ ತೇವಾಂಶ 60% ಇದೆ. ಆದ್ದರಿಂದ, ನೀರು ಹಾಕುವ ಅಗತ್ಯವಿಲ್ಲ.
messages.en: You don't have to water your crop. In your "super plot", the soil moisture is 100% and 88%, and the best moisture is 60%. Hence, there is no need to add water.
messages.content_transliterated: neevu nimma belege neeru hakabekagilla. nimma "super plot" nalli, mannina tevansh 100% mattu 88% ide, mattu sreshta tevansh 60% ide. addarinda, neeru hakuv agatyavilla.

initial_message: मेरी फसल के लिए कौन सा खाद डालूं?

messages.content: मेरी फसल के लिए कौन सा खाद डालूं?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I put for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Which fertilizer should I apply for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: meri fasal ke lie kaun sa khad daalun?

messages.content:
आपकी फसल (केले) के लिए, वर्तमान में आप "ग्रैंड ग्रोथ" चरण में हैं, जो 9वें सप्ताह में है। आज, 20 नवंबर 2025 को, आपको निम्नलिखित खाद डालने की सिफारिश की जाती है:

### वर्तमान सप्ताह (9वां सप्ताह):
1. **फॉस्फोरिक एसिड**: इसे अन्य खादों के आवेदन से 15-20 मिनट पहले अलग से डालें।
2. **संभावित खाद वितरण संयोजन**:
   - 1 किलोग्राम/पौधा **12-61-0** + 10.5 किलोग्राम/पौधा **यूरिया**
   - 4 किलोग्राम/पौधा **24-24-0** + 9 किलोग्राम/पौधा **यूरिया**
   - 11 किलोग्राम/पौधा **यूरिया** + 1 किलोग्राम/पौधा **फॉस्फोरिक एसिड 80%**

### अगली योजना (10वां सप्ताह):
- 8 किलोग्राम/पौधा **पोटेशियम नाइट्रेट** + 6 किलोग्राम/पौधा **यूरिया** + 3.5 किलोग्राम/पौधा **मैग्नीशियम सल्फेट** (शुरुआत 10 फरवरी 2026 से)

आपको इन खादों का उपयोग करना चाहिए ताकि आपकी फसल को सही पोषण मिल सके।
messages.en:
As for your harvest (bananas), you are currently in the "Grand Growth" phase, which is in the 9th week. Today, on November 20, 2025, you are recommended to fertilize the following:

### Current Week (9th Week):
1. **Phosphoric Acid**: Add it separately 15-20 minutes before the application of other fertilizers.
2. **Potential Compost Distribution Combinations**:
   - 1 kg/wort **12-61-0** + 10.5 kg/wort **Urea**
   - 4 kg/wort **24-24-0** + 9 kg/wort **Urea**
   - 11kg/wort **Urea** + 1kg/wort **Phosphoric Acid 80%**

### Next Plan (10th week):
- 8 kg/wort **Potassium Nitrate** + 6 kg/wort **Urea** + 3.5 kg/wort **Magnesium Sulfate** (starting from 10 February 2026)

You should use these fertilizers so that your crop gets the right nutrition.
messages.content_transliterated:
aapki fasal (kele) ke lie, vartamaan mein aap "grand growth" charan mein hain, jo 9vein saptaah mein hai aaj, 20 november 2025 ko, aapko nimnalikhit khad dalne ki sifarish ki jati hai:

### vartaman saptah (9van saptah):
1. **phosphoric acid**: ise anya khadon ke avedan se 15-20 minute pahle alag se dalen
2. **sambhavit khad vitaran sanyojan**:
   - 1 kilogram/paudha **12-61-0** + 10.5 kilogram/paudha **urea**
   - 4 kilogram/paudha **24-24-0** + 9 kilogram/paudha **urea**
   - 11 kilogram/paudha **urea** + 1 kilogram/paudha **phosphoric acid 80%**

### agali yojana (10van saptah):
- 8 kilogram/paudha **potassium nitrate** + 6 kilogram/paudha **urea** + 3.5 kilogram/paudha **magnesium sulfate** (shuruat 10 farvari 2026 say)

aapko in khadon ka upyog karna chahiye taki aapki fasal ko sahi poshan mil sake

messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikala pani dyave ka?

messages.content:
आपल्या पिकाला पाणी देणे आवश्यक आहे. 

**प्लॉटचे नाव:** Plot no 1  
**सध्याची मातीची आर्द्रता:** 18% (पहिला सेंसर), 15% (दुसरा सेंसर)  
**आवश्यक आर्द्रता:** 50%  

सध्याची आर्द्रता कमी आहे, त्यामुळे पाणी देणे आवश्यक आहे. तथापि, काही कारणांमुळे मातीची आर्द्रता कमी असू शकते, जसे की वायरची हानी किंवा उपकरण हवा मध्ये असणे. कृपया याची तपासणी करा, आणि समस्या सोडवण्यासाठी समर्थन तिकीट उघडू शकता.
messages.en:
It is necessary to water your crop. 

**Plot Name:** Plot no 1  
**Current soil moisture:** 18% (1st sensor), 15% (2nd sensor)  
**Required Humidity:** 50%  

The current humidity is low, so watering is necessary. However, soil moisture can be low for some reason, such as wire damage or equipment being in the air. Please check it out, and you can open a support ticket to resolve the issue.
messages.content_transliterated:
apalya pikala pani dene avashyak aahe. 

**plotche nav:** Plot no 1  
**sadhyachi matichi ardrata:** 18% (pahila sensor), 15% (dusara sensor)  
**avashyak ardrata:** 50%  

sadhyachi ardrata kami aahe, tyamule pani dene avashyak aahe. tathapi, kahi karanammule matichi ardrata kami asu shakate, jase key vayarachi hani kinva upakaran hava madhye asane. kripaya yachi tapasani kara, ani samasya sodavanyasathi samarthan tikit ughadu shakata.

messages.content: ನೀವು ನಿಮ್ಮ ಬೆಳೆಗೆ ನೀರು ಹಾಕಬೇಕಾಗಿಲ್ಲ. ನಿಮ್ಮ 0265 ಸಕ್ಕರೆಕನೆ ಹಕ್ಕಿಗೆ 100% ನೆಲದ ತೇವಾಂಶವಿದೆ, ಇದು 50% ಒಪ್ಟಿಮಲ್ ತೇವಾಂಶಕ್ಕಿಂತ ಹೆಚ್ಚು ಇದೆ. ಆದ್ದರಿಂದ, ನೀರು ಹಾಕುವ ಅಗತ್ಯವಿಲ್ಲ.
messages.en: You don't have to water your crop. Your 0265 sugarbird has 100% ground moisture, which is more than 50% optimal humidity. Hence, there is no need to add water.

messages.content: द्राक्ष मण्याची लाम्बि कशी आहे

messages.content: द्राक्ष मण्याची लाम्बी साधारणतः 15 ते 20 सेंटीमीटर असते, परंतु ती विविध जातींवर अवलंबून असते. द्राक्षांच्या मण्याची आकारमान, रंग आणि चव यामध्येही विविधता असते. तुम्हाला कोणत्या विशिष्ट जातीबद्दल माहिती हवी आहे का?
messages.en: The length of a grape bead is usually 15 to 20 centimeters, but it depends on the variety. Grape beads also vary in size, color, and taste. Do you want to know about a particular breed?

Sultan Shahi drakshe chavdar aani god astat, jyamule tyancha vapar tajya khanyasathi aani wine banavanyasathi kela jato. tumhala ya jatibaddal aankhi kahi mahiti havi ka?
